activities: Employment Screening Services, Inc (of Spokane, WA) is an employment background screening company. ESS serves employers who have certified to ESS (and ESS has verified) to have permissible purpose for consumer reports. Our employer-clients provide us with Disclosure and Authorization documents from their applicants/employees as required by federal and certain state laws. We verify and collect information that has been specifically authorized by the consumer, such as information from educational institutions, state agencies, and employers.  We also access public records and consumer reports as authorized; we then provide to our clients Background Investigation Reports regarding their employees and prospective employees.  We do not sell, transfer, or release personal information to any party other than the one specifically authorized by the consumer.  Information is transferred off-line, manually, and, when not in violation with federal or state law, on-line.  Employment Screening Services does not handle human resource records or customer information on behalf of its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
